metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Process orders manually created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders manually created") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders created for sales order
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Process orders created for sales order") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders without planned order reference
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders without planned order reference") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders created earlier than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders created earlier than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders created later than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders created later than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders released early
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders released early") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders released late
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders released late") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders with missing parts
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders with missing parts") * 100

metrics.name: Unreleased process orders with overdue scheduled release
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Unreleased process orders with overdue scheduled release") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders confirmed late
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders confirmed late") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders with confirmation errors during goods movement
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders with confirmation errors during goods movement") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders not finally confirmed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Process orders not finally confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders delivered late
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders delivered late") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders with expected scrap
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Process orders with expected scrap") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered process orders without 'Delivery completed' set
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivered process orders without 'Delivery completed' set") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered process orders with goods receipt into quality inspection
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivered process orders with goods receipt into quality inspection") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered process orders with inspection lot from goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivered process orders with inspection lot from goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders with inspection lot with outstanding stock posting
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders with inspection lot with outstanding stock posting") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered process orders with goods receipt into unrestricted-use stock
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivered process orders with goods receipt into unrestricted-use stock") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders not (fully) delivered but technically completed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Process orders not (fully) delivered but technically completed") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders overdue for technical completion by more than 30 days
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Process orders overdue for technical completion by more than 30 days") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders released (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Process orders released") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders released (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Process orders released")

metrics.name: Process orders initially confirmed (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Process orders initially confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders initially confirmed (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Process orders initially confirmed")

metrics.name: Process orders delivered (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Process orders delivered") * 100

metrics.name: Process orders delivered (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Process orders delivered")

metrics.name: Delivered process orders technically completed (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Delivered process orders technically completed") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered process orders technically completed (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Delivered process orders technically completed")

metrics.name: Create process order with reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create process order with reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create process order without reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create process order without reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release process order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release process order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Initially confirm process order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Initially confirm process order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Finally confirm process order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Finally confirm process order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Deliver process order to unrestricted-use project stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Deliver process order to unrestricted-use project stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Deliver process order to quality inspection project stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Deliver process order to quality inspection project stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Set fully/partly delivered process order to technically completed
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Set fully/partly delivered process order to technically completed')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Set fully/partly not delivered process order to technically completed
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Set fully/partly not delivered process order to technically completed')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
